body.bibl: Miller, Dana, and Mary Teresa Hansbury. Jacob of Sarug’s Homilies on Jacob: On Jacob’s Revelation at Bethel, and On Our Lord and Jacob, on the Church and Rachel and on Leah and the Synagogue. Texts from Christian Late Antiquity 58, The Metrical Homilies of Mar Jacob of Sarug. Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2020.

Dana Miller and Mary Teresa Hansbury, Jacob of Sarug’s Homilies on Jacob: On Jacob’s Revelation at Bethel, and On Our Lord and Jacob, on the Church and Rachel and on Leah and the Synagogue, Texts from Christian Late Antiquity 58, The Metrical Homilies of Mar Jacob of Sarug (Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2020).
